name: Pac Tac Atac
description:
For Global Game Jam 2018 We created a virtual a HTC Vive VR game were you can draw a weapon and use it to attack enemies. 

You have crash landed in an alien planet and you send a transmission to the Galactic Space Assistance for a tow. While stranded you are supplied with 2 special spray cans that can be used to “draw” defensive weapons in case of an emergency.  Surely moments later they natives show up and they are not happy about you or your transmitter.  Survive the waves of angry aliens that are set to destroy your transmitter.

If you want to know more about the game and its development process check out:
http://pactacatac.anothercircus.com
